author: andschwa
body: The native code on Windows for the host  which loads CoreCLR and then PowerShell  is monad nttargets assemblies nativemsh pwrshcommon pwrshcommon.cpp  While we mirror it pretty closely in host_cmdline  which is being refactored into libhost , we do not currently create an AppDomain, which is done on Windows. This is something we'll need to look into doing correctly.  VSO create date - 10/20/2015 13:59:00
title: Reconcile libhost with PowerShell on Windows
